game_description: It's a beautiful day out here in the countryside. Might as well enjoy it doing your job. Grow some plants, sell some veggies, or head to town to buy some new tools for the farm. Our goal is to release regular content updates, new mechanics, and tweaks to existing systems based on community feedback and discussions, so we would love for you to join us on our discord and help us shape this game! https://discord.gg/mM2UsAF Features Enjoy the countryside. Grow more than 15 different kinds of plants. Sell vegetables to gain money and buy new tools. Work hard or hardly work. Save the game inside your house. Do some fishing. Do some mining. Do some cooking. Play with real time OR play with a faster simulated time. Unlock items for your house or the farm! Climb some trees and pick some apples.
review_1: Its a good game but it really needs multiplayer it would be so fun to play with friends
review_3: Played this for 8 hours straight the first day I played it. It’s a shame development came to an end this game has so much potential and is already so much fun in a vr experience.
review_4: I am in LOVE with this game. Can someone answer me, how is it free?! I bought the developers a “coffee” but it looks like only a handful had done the same. And this game is so fulfilling. It’s my own little village where I can garden by my house, hang out and collect things on the beach, build up my ranch and animals, fish in many different areas, and I can even mine for ore… which is very satisfying for some reason. The ONLY thing that I wish was different, was if there was more of some kind of social interaction. it gets a little “lonely” Otherwise, great job!!
review_5: It is a great game, but the lag and fishing glitch is a little Emerson breaking
